name: Separation Anxiety (Angelica Deverell)
description:
Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 - Joined Together.

(We couldn't figure out the screen size so just click the fullscreen button to see it all! There were also some weird problems with the health - just press R if you get stuck.)

Being joined together brings you health and happiness. But to reach the goal you have to separate and your health will decline. Race through the maze to reach each other again.

You're both controlled simultaneously using the arrow keys - so you're still joined together even when you're apart!

This is our first game jam so it might be a bit buggy!

Artwork is all from Kenney Assests.

Sound effects:

LittleRobotSoundFactory - Jingle_Win_01 and Jingle_Win_Synth_03

Jofae - Game Powerup

Eponn - Positive Blip Effect

Mango777 - PlayerNoCanSelect

Music:

Jon Watts - Expectations

Squire Truck - Unfinished Business
